column2: "There's a really handy weapon out there that anyone with a thirst for the kill can use. It's called a Gunslash."
"Up close, it can be used like a sword, and from far away, you can use it like a gun. Talk about having your cake and eating it, too!"
"Honestly, it's not as good as a regular gun for shooting, but there's still something to be said for its versatility."
"Here, I'll give you one to try out."
"The best way to get up to speed with it is to get some hands-on experience. Why not torment some enemies with it?"
"Gunslashes are special hybrid weapons that allow you to switch between melee and ranged attacks."
"Try basic Gunslash melee attacks and Photon Arts for yourself. Though it has no special strong points, it is quick on the attack and easy to use."
"Try basic Gunslash ranged attacks for yourself. The convenience of being able to make ranged attacks without changing equipment is its best feature."
